org.spongepowered.api.command.source

Interface RemoteSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommandSource, Contextual, MessageReceiver, Subject
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Player, RconSource

    public interface RemoteSource
extends CommandSource
    Represents a source that is not local to the server. This includes Rcon, player connections, and others.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RemoteConnection getConnection()
      Gets connection information for this source.
